Activity: Log in, check emails, and review project management system. Address any urgent issues reported by QA testers (@QTEST-1).

Investigate and resolve bugs related to the player's weapon system. This could involve fixing aiming inaccuracies, addressing animation glitches, or optimizing weapon performance. Contact @3DMOD-1 for the newest animation.

Meet with @LVDN-1 to discuss level design requirements and provide technical feedback. Ensure the levels are optimized for gameplay and performance, and that they integrate seamlessly with the game's systems.
Implement and test new enemy AI behaviors, such as flanking, cover usage, or dynamic pathfinding. Work closely with the designers (@LDES-1, @SDES-1) to ensure the AI is challenging but fair.
Profile the game's performance and identify areas that need optimization. This could involve reducing draw calls, optimizing shaders, or improving memory management.
Conduct a code review of the server-side code submitted by @SDEV-1, focusing on security, scalability, and data integrity. Provide feedback and suggestions for improvement.
Update task progress, document important findings and decisions, and prepare for the next day's work. Inform the current bug fixing process.
